title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, April 4, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss reports on the draft made by the Confederate government. He discusses his daughter's illness and describes the various people he has met recently.
keywords: Women, Battle Description, National Government, Family, Patriotism, Death/Casualties, Church/Religious Activity, Military Authority, American Civil War
